mil2:4.7: pāpuṇāmi → na pāpuṇāmi (maku), majjhanhikasūriyo → majjhantikasuriyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | majjhattikasuriyo (maku)
mil2:7.4: catubbedā → dhanubbedā (maku) | cātubbedā (pts-vp-pli1ed), ketu → hetu (bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1ed), chandasā buddhavacanena → chando sāmuddi vacanena (bj) | chandasā muddā vacanena (pts-vp-pli1ed), vitaṇḍavādī → vādī (bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mil2:8.1: senaṅgadassanaṃ katvā → senāgaṇanaṃ kāretvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | senāgāhaṃ kāretvā (maku), lokāyatavitaṇḍajanasallāpaplavacittakotūhalo → ... ppavattanakotuhalo (bj) | ... sallāpappavuttako kotuhalo (maku) | ... pappavattakotūhalo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mil2:34.8: Pāpakāni malāni pabbājeti → pāpakānaṃ malānaṃ pabbājetuṃ pabbajito (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | pāpaṃ vajjituṃ dosaṃ vajjituṃ (maku)
mil2:36.2: vatthāni, kāmanissitāni gihibyañjanabhaṇḍāni → kamanīyāni gihivyañjanāni (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kammaniyāni gihibyañjanāni (maku)
mil2:77.2: kotthuko → kotthako (maku) | koṭṭhuko (csp1ed), ahituṇḍikasamāgato → ahiguṇṭhikasamāgato (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed), satiṃ → dhitiṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | cittaṃ (maku)
